body:
PR #692 removed all the 2dc code path.  We had to remove certain unit test in `TestActivityReplicatorSuite` as they were not exercising NDC code path.  Need to create equivalent test for NDC.  Here are the ones which were removed:
```
TestSyncActivity_ActivityCompleted
TestSyncActivity_ActivityRunning
TestSyncActivity_ActivityRunning_LocalActivityVersionLarger
TestSyncActivity_ActivityRunning_Update_LargerVersion
TestSyncActivity_ActivityRunning_Update_SameVersionLargerAttempt
TestSyncActivity_ActivityRunning_Update_SameVersionSameAttempt
TestSyncActivity_ActivityRunning_ZombieWorkflow
TestSyncActivity_IncomingScheduleIDLarger_IncomingVersionLarger
TestSyncActivity_IncomingScheduleIDLarger_IncomingVersionSmaller
```
title: Enable TestActivityReplicatorSuite unit test removed during 2dc deprecation
